name: Graeagle Meadows Golf Course
description: Set amid stunning mountain scenery and the pastoral charm of the town of Graeagle, Graeagle Meadows Golf Course is a pioneer in the modern High Sierra golf experience. Since opening in 1968, the Ellis Van Gorder-designed course is known for the mountain views from each hole.

faqs.question: What’s included in Graeagle Meadows golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Graeagle Meadows, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation, dining, and multi-course itineraries.

faqs.question: How much do Graeagle Meadows packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $149–$349 per golfer depending on season, lodging selection, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and logistics for corporate and leisure groups.

tips.title: A pioneer in the modern High Sierra golf experience.
tips.content:
Set amid stunning mountain scenery and the pastoral charm of the town of Graeagle, Graeagle Meadows Golf Course is a pioneer in the modern High Sierra golf experience.  Since opening in 1968, the Ellis Van Gorder-designed course is known for the mountain views from each hole.
See More

tips.title: Golf The High Sierra
tips.content: Book your next group golf trip with us!

pointOfView: This course is an absolute blast! Not as well known as some of the others in the Graeagle area, this course offers wider fairways, and a ton of personality. Trees and streams come into play throughout and it's our opinion that you'll leave thinking wow, why have I not played this before. This course offers a great price value for mountain golf and couldn't be more central to a full 3 or 4 day outing in Graeagle. Located right in the middle of town, it's easy to get to and only about an hour from Reno.
contentParagraphs: Plan Graeagle Meadows with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.

Built along the banks of the Feather River, one of the eight nationally designated “Wild and Scenic Rivers’” the design deftly blends lofty pines, water, and elevated tees with the breathtaking natural beauty of the setting.

The signature 6th hole, English Gold, provides views of the Mohawk Valley, the Feather River and the snowcapped Sierra from the lofty perch of the tee. Drive the ball left of the fairway bunker and play a mind-to-short iron second shot downhill to the small green.

featuredHole.title: Hole #3 — Par 4
featuredHole.description: Classic mountain par 4 along the Middle Fork of the Feather River. The river comes into play on the right, demanding a controlled tee shot while the approach requires precision to a green backed by the pines.

testimonials.quote: If you're planning a golf trip to Graeagle, CA, you have to play Graeagle Meadows Golf Course. We had 16 guys and GTHS handled all the logistics. Course was in fantastic shape and the practice facility was top-notch.
testimonials.author: Ashley C.

testimonials.quote: Booked Graeagle Meadows Golf Course as part of a 3-course package with Golf the High Sierra. This was the standout round. Great elevation changes, strategic bunkering, and the staff couldn't have been more welcoming to our group of 20.
testimonials.author: Robert K.

testimonials.quote: Played Graeagle Meadows Golf Course with our group and it was incredible. The Ellis Van Gorder design keeps you thinking on every shot. Easily one of the best courses in Graeagle, CA.
testimonials.author: Sandy W.
